wishing_fountain.advancements.set_sail.t: It’s better to burn out than to fade away
wishing_fountain.advancements.set_sail.d: 「The world is not boring. It is you who bores yourself」
wishing_fountain.misc.only_one_map_searc: There are already boats on the way!
wishing_fountain.misc.map_description: §5A magical boat that will help you find your destination
